text: Petra Haden (born October 11, 1971, in New York City) is an American violinist and singer. == Discography == === Albums === * Imaginaryland (1999) * Bella Neurox (credited as Miss Murgatroid & Petra Haden) (1999) * Petra Haden & Bill Frisell (credited as Petra Haden & Bill Frisell) (2003) * Petra Haden Sings: The Who Sell Out (2005) * Hearts & Daggers (credited as Miss Murgatroid & Petra Haden) (2008) * Ten Years (credited as Petra Haden & Woody Jackson) (2008) === that dog. Albums === * That Dog. (1994) * Totally Crushed Out! (1995) * Retreat From The Sun (1997) ==Other websites== * Petra Haden Official website * Petra Haden on Myspace * Pete Townshend on Petra Haden Sings: The Who Sell Out from The Boston Globe. * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City Category:American violinists
title: Petra Haden
